11.extramessage:
Gathering data of your apps (${queueLength} requests left).
Some data may not be available. Try to refresh the page in a few minutes.

101.extramessage:
Could not initialize AppIDs and/or PackageIDs. Retrying in a few seconds.
Make sure you logged in to partner.steampowered.com and partner.steamgames.com to have access to games data.

102.extramessage:
Could not parse page creation dates. Retrying in a few seconds.
Make sure you logged in to partner.steampowered.com and partner.steamgames.com and have access to games data.
Error: ${error}

103.extramessage:
Error while initializing game stats storage for app ${appID}.
Error: ${error}
